channel.title: I remove weather from my server i deleted weather.txt and it stills shows fogs
channel.description: and snow i keep doing that but dosent work anyway i cant remove the whole thing off the server so it wont come back could anyone tell me how and i need help on making ::rules so it stops them from moving and says read before playing need help bad please ive been trying to find that out

item.title: I remove weather from my server i deleted weather.txt and it stills shows fogs
item.dc:creator: @MJS252 MJS252
item.description:
@MJS252 wrote:

I have the occasional problem with weather but if it ever changes I just change the value back to 0 and it is fine again.
and if you want you can go into client and add an if statment that says if weather isn’t equal to 0 to change it to 0 but I think deleting it isn’t smart

as for the ::rules that would just be a loop.

like…(this is not a real code just an example)

do{
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}while(playercommand != rules);

Read full topic
